p: Eggerâ€™s test results were significant for HIV prevalence among PWID and FSWs ( p = 0.00), HCV among FSWs ( p = 0.009), HBV among PWID and FSWs ( p = 0.00), HIV/HCV among PWID ( p = 0.00), HIV/HCV among FSWs ( p = 0.029), HIV/HBV among PWID and FSWs ( p = 0.003), and HCV/HBV among PWID ( p = 0.008), pointing to publication bias. However, it was not significant for HIV/HCV/HBV prevalence ( p = 0.432) and HCV among PWID ( p = 0.078) indicating no publication bias.
